_header: Be it known and understand / This City should be free and now is bound
_description: Rude verses on injustices in Coventry 1495 — seven couplets

CovLeet.First Lines:
Be it knowen & vnderstandThis Cite shulde be free & nowe is
                    bonde…
CovLeet.Last Lines:
…Whenne oure Ale is TunnedȜe shall haue drynk to your
                    Cake
CovLeet.Note:
Written after is ‘Caviatus’ (f. 275v);
                    last couplet does not rhyme.
